entities.base: The woman was bullying the man, so we [rescued]| her
entities.source: The woman was bullying the man, so we [punished]| him

entities.base: I spread the cloth on the table in order to [protect] the|  table
entities.source: I spread the cloth on the table in order to [display] the|  cloth

entities.base: The man had ordered a lot of food from the waiter, so we [paid] the| waiter
entities.source: The man had ordered a lot of food from the waiter, so we [charged] the| man

entities.base: The foxes are getting in at night and attacking the chickens, so I have to [protect] the| chickens
entities.source: The foxes are getting in at night and attacking the chickens, so I have to [kill] the| foxes

events.base: I poured water from the bottle into the cup until the [bottle] was| empty
events.source: I poured water from the bottle into the cup until the [cup] was| full

events.base: He ate until his [stomach] was| full
events.source: He ate until his [plate] was| empty

events.base: Paul tried to call George on the phone, but [Paul] couldn't| reach
events.source: Paul tried to call George on the phone, but [George] couldn't| answer

events.base: After the student asked the teacher a question, the [student] was reluctant to| repeat it
events.source: After the student asked the teacher a question, the [teacher] was reluctant to| answer it

events.base: The drain is clogged with hair, so the [drain] has to be| cleaned
events.source: The drain is clogged with hair, so the [hair] has to be| removed

events.base: When the powerful military invaded the weak tribe, the [tribe] was| defeated
events.source: When the powerful military invaded the weak tribe, the [military] was| victorious

events.base: The fish ate the worm. The [worm] was| tasty
events.source: The fish ate the worm. The [fish] was| hungry

events.base: Bob paid for Charlie's college education. [Bob] was very| generous
events.source: Bob paid for Charlie's college education. [Charlie] was very| grateful
